alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 10:05AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday morning and continue rising to around 18.0 feet early Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM CDT.
